text: The Yarkon Cemetery is a cemetery in Petah Tikva, Israel. Many cultural and famous Israeli artists are buried there, including Ofra Haza. The cemetery was established in 1991. It is named for the Yarkon River that extends along the cemetery. == Other websites == * Yarkon Cemetery in Chevra kadisha - Tel Aviv Jaffa Category:1991 establishments in Asia Category:Cemeteries in Israel Category:Petah Tikva Category:1990s establishments in Israel
title: Yarkon Cemetery
